text.autoconfig.notify.title: Notify Config (Requires Restart)
text.autoconfig.notify.option.displayUpd: Enable the badge that tells you a mod is up-to-date
text.autoconfig.notify.option.displayUns: Enable the badge that tells you a mod doesn't support Notify
text.autoconfig.notify.option.renderMain: Enable the tooltip that tells you the % support of Notify in your pack
text.autoconfig.notify.option.dumpInfoOn: Enable dumping of debug information on the next launch.
This will only affect the next launch.
